attributes.action: Give Snoop Dogg a visa for the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I bought tickets to see Snoop perform live in Nottingham nearly 6 months ago & have looked forward to seeing him ever since.
The government has allowed known terrorists and other criminals in and out of the UK, you allowed Abu Hamza to stay here for years & you let Mike Tyson visit (and indeed many celebrities with convictions/links to crime)
Please don't disappoint thousands of his fans.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
